title: BRING JIO BACK AGAINðŸ˜­
content:
Jio used to work perfectly fine on the EC campus, but for the past two weeks, it has turned into absolute gutter trash. I canâ€™t load shit. And PESU WiFi is just as useless, it logs me out constantly and refuses to connect when I actually need it.

It took me 10 whole minutes just to pay the auto Anna because of this shit. I had to walk around campus like an idiot just to find a signal.

comments.body: Always carry cash even if you have UPI. I learned it the hard way.
Wht is happening with the jio network though? I
Spam the IT team man atp

I guess we should all complain the Jio authorities
Then only some serious actions might be taken
Because I seriously feel united we stand divided  we fall
